Translations.Text: Day ur nudan ara tamurt, ad walin amek tevoa d wid i ten id izwaren. Llan ifen ten tazmert, akked lateo, di tmurt. Issemeelleq asen Oebbi, ilmend ibekkaven nnsen. Ur asen illi umeareb, mgal Oebbi
Akka, acku ppasen $uosen, imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen, u nitni jehlen. Issemeelleq asen Oebbi. Ih, Neppa, d Uzmir, d Bab uaaqeb uqsie
Ni$ Nuzen ed Musa s issekniyen nne£, s udabu iberrzen
ar Feraun, Haman, akked Qaoun. Nnan: "d aseeear, d akeddab
Mi sen d iusa, s tidep s $uone£, nnan: "en$et arrac n wid iumnen yides, ssidret tilawin nnsen". Tandit ijehliyen siwa di ttelfan
Inna Feraun: "anfet iyi ad n$e$ Musa, xas ad inuj ar Mass is. Ugade$, nek, ad ibeddel ddin nnwen, ne$ a d issekcem lefsad di tmurt
Inna Musa: "nek, ad iyi Iuueo Mass iw u Mass nnwen, si yal amzuxi, ur numin s wass uqeiii
